response.overview: The police inspector makes a line up between Petka - a raped girl and three brothers. Petka points out Dimitar. The innocent young man is shocked. Dimitar meets with the father of Petka and offers him money. The father refuses. During the trial, the stories of Dimitar's friends are controversial. He is sentenced to four years in prison. Petka confesses that she has pointed Dimitar out of random. She likes his brother Trifon and she gave herself to him willingly, but his father threatened her and she decided to blame Dimitar.
response.title: Na Chisto
